title: Shoes

properties.name: description
properties.value: Shoes a quest item in the Spirits of the Elid quest. They are in Nardah's mayor's house. When a knife is used on them, two soles are obtained. One of these must be given to the Genie, who lives in the crevice west of Nardah, in exchange for the Statuette of Elidinis. They can be worn but have no bonuses.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Shoes
This article is about the item used in the Spirits of the Elid quest. For other uses, see Shoes (disambiguation).

Item ID6790

Shoes a quest item in the Spirits of the Elid quest. They are in Nardah's mayor's house. When a knife is used on them, two soles are obtained. One of these must be given to the Genie, who lives in the crevice west of Nardah, in exchange for the Statuette of Elidinis. They can be worn but have no bonuses.

 Attack bonuses

 Defence bonuses

[[File:Shoes detail.png|left|100px]]
'''Shoes''' a [[quest item]] in the [[Spirits of the Elid]] [[quest]]. They are in [[Nardah]]'s mayor's house. When a [[knife]] is used on them, two [[sole]]s are obtained. One of these must be given to the [[Genie (Spirits of the Elid)|Genie]], who lives in the crevice west of Nardah, in exchange for the [[Statuette (Spirits of the Elid)|Statuette of Elidinis]]. They can be worn but have no bonuses.
